title: You Are My Flower
lyrics: suljaneun chaewoya je masiji han janman deo ttarajwoyo a niya oneureun ban janman hallae nae nim eo di gyesin gayo dangsini tteonan i jarieseo na hollo tto sul hanjanhae nae kkumsoge oneulbamdo chajawaseo mosdahaess deon yaegireul hae geudaeneun kkocciya nae kkocciya nae ga seumsoge pineun geudaeneun dariya nae dariya nae ma me chaoreu neun geudaeneun suriya nae suriya chwihae beoril geosman gata naege saranghanda malhaenohgo jikyeojunda malhaenohgo eodil gassnayo ...sarangira mideoss go pyeongsaengtorok uri hamkke hal jul aras seo seulpeudorok apeuge wae jakkuman nareul ull yeo bammada pieonaneun kkoccip geu geon geudaeya naui gaseume chaoreuneun dareun geudaeya
